subdisciplines.name: Environmental Justice
subdisciplines.description: The study of the intersection between social justice and environmental issues.

subdisciplines.name: Climate History
subdisciplines.description: The study of the history of climate and climate change, and its impact on human societies and the environment.

subdisciplines.name: Ecological History
subdisciplines.description: The study of the interconnections and feedbacks between human societies and ecological systems over time.

subdisciplines.name: Environmental Ethics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the moral and ethical issues related to the environment, including our relationship to the natural world and responsibilities towards future generations.
